The lack of in-game information for TFT is the the main reason I despise the mode. Adding in champion stats was a nice start, but now you need to add in what champion abilities are affected by what stats (i.e add a little physical/magic damage icon next to the damage value) and the ability to preview ability damage numbers (and maybe stats) before purchasing someone. 

You should also be able to right click on items to see what they can build in to. You should not need outside sources or trial and error to understand what does what in the mode. Releasing ranked before all or most of this was implemented was pretty silly imo.

I suppose DaedricPsycho speaks for everyone who plays LOL all over the world since he says its boring and RNG reliant. Yes, it is RNG reliant but so are a lot of other games.
